description: Discover how Gemesis, an open-source platform, is reshaping the NFT industry by empowering indie creators and collectors. Explore the concepts of decentralization, open collaboration, and community empowerment in the NFT world.
keywords: Gemesis, NFT, open-source platform, indie hacking, digital assets, blockchain, decentralization, creative empowerment, digital ownership
title: Gemesis (OSP) and Indie Hacking: Revolutionizing the NFT Industry
